text: OpenAIRE open science initiative, supports Open Access policy European Commission. R package OpenAIRE provides access within R OpenAIRE RESTful APIs, intended metadata discovery exploration .

title: Projects given an acronym — openaire_projects
text: countries countries filter , comma-separated string 2-letter ISO country codes, default "SE" acronyms acronyms filter , whitespace-separated string, default "KTH"
